channel.title: Help me with my server - I have a BIG ERROR! can anybody help me?
channel.description:
anyway, the error says:
I am running it on compile.bat: I have compiled it...all went right...I hit 'run' and it came up with this huge error...
[code]Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:1404) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:22) at server.main(server.java:27)[/code]
I am using phonescape (no, I don't know why it says pimpscape either) and I have Mod Tharok's Perfect Compiler V1.9. I have Java 6 and the JDK 6uI... Can anybody help me?
